title: Girls On Different Planets
description: Thistle, a twenty-something graduate student, captures Derek on her mother's strawberry farm. On her planet, Antigone, all men are taken prisoner, but he's from somewhere else. While Derek is being held on charges that carry the death penalty, Thistle makes arrangements to guard him, just in case he is acquitted, and sleeps outside his cell. Of course, what guy wouldn't find this captivating.
author: John Blandly
